flowRoot.flowPara: Remote Viewer will use SPICE by default. If SPICE is not available, it will default to VNC.

All sections are aligned to the center, with padding or margin on the sides. Text is not necessarily aligned, however — just the blocks are center-aligned. You can see the alignment in the labels & values in Manual Connection and under More information.

text.tspan: Connect with any SPICE or VNC viewer application.

flowRoot.flowPara: If either SPICE or VNC is not available,

text.tspan: Connect with any SPICE or VNC viewer application.

flowRoot.flowPara: Clicking "Launch Remote Viewer" will download a .vv file and launch Remote Viewer.
Remote Viewer is available for most operating systems. To install it, search for it in GNOME Software or run the following:
• RHEL, CentOS: sudo yum install virt-viewer
• Ubuntu, Debian: sudo apt-get install virt-viewer
• Windows: Download the MSI from virt-manager.org
